com.jmr.wrapperx.client

Class HttpConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jmr.wrapperx.client.HttpConnection

  • public class HttpConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Networking Library HttpConnection.java Purpose: Connects to a Servlet over HTTP protocol. Takes the URL of the location of the servlet to connect.
    Version:
    1.0 8/4/2014
    Author:
    Jon R (Baseball435)

    • Field Summary

      private Client client

      private HttpSession session

      The URL of the servlet.
